title: There goes my Murasame Essence Reaver Yorick.
body:
Title. 
adcs already ruin my games already with that bs crit that chunks tanks and squishies alike healing for most of the damage they do and low cd skills save a few of them high ratios great cc utility and the saftey of being ranged

replies.body:
Yorick is being reworked, so don't worry.

What we need to worry about is Jayce is being buffed with crit by this and Ezreal is being nerfed into the floor because crit doesn't affect anything in his damn kit. >>
i could make it work currently. also the loss of ap on trinity messes up my mixed damage jax but i kinda liked being able to play yorick

Jax is gaining the ability to use crit, so it's not too much of a problem with him, plus other items like Gunblade being buffed are making him a happy camper.

Yorick will be reworked either this season or the start of next, hopefully this one... He's prolly right after Poppy.
armor while less gold efficetive than ad and crit is much more commonly built than mr

most people build armor though its bad its the most common thing and the ap on jax's skills provide significant burst along with sustained damage with a mixed build
